attributes.action: Hormone Replacement Therapy. Why we have to pay?.
attributes.additional_details:
I just think as a woman we had our periods which we had to pay for products.
Then protecting ourselves from becoming pregnant having to take a contraceptive pill free through the doctor.
Then pregnancy bringing a human into the world.
 Peri Menopause  
Brain fog,
Achy bones,
Hair loss,
Hot flashes.
Breast tenderness.
Worse premenstrual syndrome.
Fatigue.
Irregular periods.
Vaginal dryness; discomfort during sex.
Urine leakage when coughing or sneezing. 
we have to buy products for all the above.
attributes.background:
Either to scrap the payment for HRT. Or reduce the cost. As most contraceptives are free the morning after pill is free on prescription.
Myself becoming peri was a shock..  There are some many changes to my body and new charges for products i pay out for just to live a normal life.
